com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice
Class Timer

java.lang.Object
  com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.Service
      com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice.Timer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Timer
extends Service

Started and stopped by server framework. Spawns PollingThreadGenerator thread every minute. Runs Round-Robin SQL update() method and prunes polling result raw data tables every minute.
